title: How to use pre-trained models for fine tuning on different dataset ?
body_html:
Hi,

I have downloaded a pre-trained model for inception v3 (inception_v3_2016_08_28.tar.gz file)from https://github.com/tensorflow/models/tree/master/slim#Pretrained which contains the file inception_v3.ckpt. Could anyone please help me how to use this file to fine-tune on a different dataset ?

Thanks in advance.
body_text:
Hi,

Thanks in advance.
body:
Hi,

I have downloaded a pre-trained model for inception v3 (inception_v3_2016_08_28.tar.gz file)from [https://github.com/tensorflow/models/tree/master/slim#Pretrained](url) which contains the file inception_v3.ckpt. Could anyone please help me how to use this file to fine-tune on a different dataset ?

Thanks in advance.
